forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain and wind early. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy late. High near 15C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 67F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
